Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:HL7ManagerMessageType@Ensemble HL7 Message Type") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "HL7 Message Type definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,! set mt=%request.Get("MT") set category=$p(mt,":",2) set secondary=$p(mt,":",3) set description=..EscapeHTML(##class(EnsLib.HL7.Schema).GetDescription(mt)) Write !,!,"",! Write !,"",! Write ! If (mt '= "") { write "",! set mt=$g(^EnsHL7.Schema(category,"MT",secondary,"rettype")) write "",! } Write !,!,"
"_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_(description)_"
Message Structure",! set ms=$get(^EnsHL7.Schema(category,"MT",secondary)) if ms="" set ms=category_":"_$p(secondary,"_",1) write ""_ms_"
Return Message Type",! write $s(mt="":" ",1:""_mt_""),"
",! Write !,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Message Types in category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write !,!,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble HL7 Message Type</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
